scripts.build:lib: shx rm -rf dist && tsc --build tsconfig.json && shx cp package.json dist
scripts.pre-publish: npm run build:lib && cd dist && json -I -f package.json -e "this.devDependencies=undefined; this.scripts=undefined;"
scripts.publish:github: npm run pre-publish && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:yalc: npm run pre-publish && cd dist && yalc publish
